#summary paginationHasPrevious([handle])
#labels api,0.8,view,helper

_*Note:* This wiki contains "bleeding edge" documentation, which may reflect a future version of Wheels. Entries in the wiki may also be incomplete and unedited. For the "official" documentation, please visit [http://www.cfwheels.com/docs Official ColdFusion on Wheels Documentation]._

*Description*:

Returns true if previous pages exists in the pagination.

*Return Type*:

Boolean

*

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

||   || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *handle* || string || false || query || The handle given to the query that the pagination links should be displayed for ||

*Usage*:

This function can be used when you need more control over pagination than the paginationLinks function provides.

*Examples*:

{{{
<cfif paginationHasPrevious()>
  do something...
</cfif>


}}}
